greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: (Product k^k) * (Sum 1/k^k) where both the sum and product are over those positive integers k that divide n.
link: Alois P. Heinz, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..200
mathematica: a[n_] := Function[l, Product[k^k, {k, l}] * Sum[1/k^k, {k, l}]] @ Divisors[n]; Array[a, 20] (* _Jean-François Alcover_, Mar 23 2017 *)
results.author: _Leroy Quet_, Oct 11 2000
